title: Former NBC Sports Chairman Dick Ebersol on Sports Media Landscape
itunes:title: Former NBC Sports Chairman Dick Ebersol on Sports Media Landscape
description:
Dick Ebersol, former NBC Sports chairman, co-creator of Saturday Night Live and creator of Sunday Night Football joins hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower to talk about his new book, "From Saturday Night to Sunday Night", and he shares his thoughts on the current sports media landscape. Plus, Bloomberg's Gerry Smith joins to talk about the massive Amazon Prime/NFL Thursday Night Football deal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
